thread.title: Ground News - Reinvigorated labour movement enjoys 'remarkable year'
thread.title_full: Ground News - Reinvigorated labour movement enjoys 'remarkable year'

author: Windsor Star
title: Ground News - Reinvigorated labour movement enjoys 'remarkable year'
text:
Summary by Windsor Star The clock was wound backwards in 2023 by a labour movement that used leverage created by a confluence of events — including COVID, inflation and low unemployment — to win significant contract gains in a way that hasn’t been seen in decades. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
